name: Shopping Mahjong connect
description:
Shopping Mahjong connect is a tile-matching puzzle game. Simply connect pairs adjacent to each other and on the outer edge of the board!

It's ideal if you want some solo gaming time or a mentally engaging challenge.

Game Features:
  • Simple, but attractive gameplay!
  • Nice pixel visuals
  • 24 levels to beat
  • Levels with gravity support in all 4 directions
  • Steam Achievements support
  • Shuffle and hint functions helpers
